value:
$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I have orders from Lady Freyja.
I cannot allow you to go any
further—no matter the cost.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait! We don't have to do this!$k$pLady Freyja just told us about all
five of us being together, being
friends, back in the beginning...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Because of you I was forced
to remember.$k$pForced to remember my life before...
Forced to have the memories of my
mortal life flood into my mind...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Cool|"I wish you'd just die."$k$p"If it weren't for you, I'd be happy."$k$p...Those were the words I heard
most from my mother.$k$pI became this because I wanted it.$k$pBefore, I was miserable,
completely unloved...$k$pBut in the world of my dreams...
I became something special.$k$pAnd we saved the world when
no adult could—or even knew to.
We saved everyone.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I don't need reality. This is what
I always dreamed of being.$k$pI'm not yet satisfied. I won't let
you take my dream from me.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I... We...we saved the world...$k$pWe became...our best selves...
for everyone else's sake...
So...now, I should be...$k$pI am not that...unwanted child...
I-I am...$k$pMother, I—
Mo...ther...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p

$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|If I become a true hero,
then what?$k$pIf Mother was nice to me...
That would make me happy.$k$pBut I'm a useless child... I can't do
anything right, so Mother always
has to yell at me...$k$pSo I want to become a hero.
I want to save everyone...$k$pMaybe Mother will tell me I did
good then... Maybe she'll even
say I'm a hero!$k$pHeehee! I can't wait! I hope I can
make you proud someday, Mother!$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|
